description:
Verify that the user lands on home page.
Go to shoes category
Click on the first item that shows up on the page.
Add that product to the cart.
Go to the cart and verify that the product is in the cart.
Add shipping details as follows:
   - Name: "Amanda Kim"
   - Email: "amanda.kim@example.com"
   - Street Address: "123 Main Street"
   - City: "Anytown"
   - State: "CA"
   - Zipcode: "12345"
5. Click "Checkout" button
6. Verify redirect to order success page
7. Verify order confirmation number is displayed.

steps.stepDescription: Launch a web browser and navigate to the homepage at http://localhost:3005.
Verify that you have successfully landed on the home page by checking that the banner image is visible.
Click on the Shoes category to browse all available shoe items.
Select the first item that appears on the Shoes category page.
Add the selected product to the shopping cart.
Navigate to the shopping cart and verify the product has been added.
Enter shipping details using the provided information: Name: Amanda Kim, Email: amanda.kim@example.com, Street Address: 123 Main Street, City: Anytown, State: CA, Zipcode: 12345.
Click the Checkout button to proceed with the order.
Confirm that the page redirects to an order success page.
Verify that an order confirmation number is displayed on the success page.
Take a screenshot of the completed order process to validate the test results.

description:
Open the url and verify that the user lands on home page.
Go to shoes category
Click on the first item that shows up on the page.
Add that product to the cart.
Go to the cart and verify that there is one product in the cart.
Click on the "Checkout Button" and verify user stays on the same page.

Verify that: name, and email field shoes error state or red border.

steps.stepDescription: Launch the browser and navigate to the target URL http://localhost:3005 to load the home page.
Confirm that the home page has loaded successfully by checking for the banner image.
Navigate to the shoes category from the home page.
Select the first product displayed in the shoes category.
Add the chosen product to the shopping cart.
Access the shopping cart and verify that exactly one product is present in it.
Click the Checkout Button and verify that the page does not navigate away.
Check that the name and email fields display an error state, indicated by a red border.
Take a screenshot of the final state to document the completed test process.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Navigate to shoes product, add to cart and verify error states
